posts.post_title: FOR SALE: Several N284 Buchner Gold Coin SGC/PSA Graded
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Rhett Yeakley
I have several graded N284 Buchner Gold Coin Tobacco cards that I have decided to sell. Please see scans below. Prices do not include shipping (add $5), and paypal okay.


Tom Brown, Pittsburg PSA 4 VGEX  $300  
Cliff Carroll, Washington PSA 4 VGEX  $290  
John Coleman, Pittsburg PSA 4 VGEX  $300  
Jim Fogarty, Philadelphia (scanned previous to being graded) SGC 60 EX (Only 1 graded higher)  $415  
Charlie Getzien, Detroit SGC 40 VG (Only 2 graded higher)  $260  
Doggie Miller, Pittsburg PSA 4 VGEX  $310  
Al Myers, Washington PSA 4 VGEX  $265  

email to rhettyeakley@netzero.com if interested
